channel.description: Recent content in public speaking on I Make Things

item.title: On Public Speaking And Self Esteem
item.description: I got an invite from Cal Evans to watch this week’s episode of his weekly show, with this week’s topic being a public speaking Q&A with Adam Culp (as this is the third time Cal has pinged me regarding public speaking, I think he really wants me to start ). It got me thinking again about my feelings toward the prospect of public speaking for me. Espeically when it’s for larger audiences, my knee-jerk response to “you should give a talk,” has historically been “hell no.
